hooks.prompt: If this is a `gh pr create` command, ensure you use the PR template from .github/pull_request_template.md. Include: Summary, Changes, Test Plan (with checkbox results), and Screenshots for UI changes. Use HEREDOC syntax for the --body parameter.

hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path') && if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.rs$'; then cd src-tauri && cargo check --message-format=short 2>&1; fi
